##My Thoughts

Well, I have to say this year is one to remember. Who ever thought COVID-19 would turn our lives upside down in a matter of weeks. It is still feels unreal to say that I was walking outside and hanging out with my friends with my friends, but now I am cooped up inside my house living with trepidation of not knowing what will happen next.
